mapper.update: update WISDOM.LOG set OPERATEOR = #{operateor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATETYPE = #{operatetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATEDATE = #{operatedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPERATERESULT = #{operateresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, OPERATEOR, OPERATETYPE, OPERATEDATE, OPERATERESULT, IP from WISDOM.LOG
